pages.text: $(bgreen)Giant Wall Nut$() is the mega version of a Wall-nut, not just a larger Wall-nut.$(br)$(byellow)Sun Cost$() : $(l)200$()$(br)$(bblue)Recharge$() : $(l)Super Slow$()$(br)$(l)Features$() : It is a $(l)defender$() plant that has high health, and it can $(bred)attract enemies$() in 10 * 10 range to attack itself.

$(bpurple)Special :$() It can $(bred)block$() $(l)pole zombie, pogo zombie, dolphin rider$() to stop them.$(br)$(bgreen)Plant Food :$() It will gain a large amount of $(l)defence life$() to protecte itself.
